## How to get there

### By Car 🚗
The easiest option is to go by car from Düsseldorf. There is sufficient parking on the property.

::: {.content-block}
```{=html}
<iframe
  width="300"
  height="300"
  frameborder="0" style="border:0"
  referrerpolicy="no-referrer-when-downgrade"
  src="https://www.google.com/maps/embed/v1/directions?origin=Frida,+Bilker+Allee,+Düsseldorf-District+3,+Germany&destination=Aulnay-la-Rivière,+France&key=AIzaSyBFw0Qbyq9zTFTd-tUY6dZWTgaQzuU17R8"
  allowfullscreen>
</iframe>
```
:::

### By Plane or Train ✈️ 🚄

When taking a plane or train, the last part of the journey requires a lift or a rental car. Those traveling by car will pass both Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport (CDG) and Paris Orly Airport (ORY). Please coordinate a pick-up amongst each other.
